Author: hammerprice
Text: Hey when I fell in love with my current partner I ignored everything else around me to the point where I got kicked out of an overseas homestay house I was really fortunate to have been given the opportunity to stay in rent-free even though I had nowhere else lined up to stay in a foreign country, bc I wasn't paying attention to anything or anyone else.  What I'm trying to say here is that love can be completely and utterly all-consuming, and while it still sucks that your BFF doesn't have as much time for you right now as she used to 1) that will slow down and she will come back to you because you're her bestie and that sticks and 2) it has absolutely NOTHING to do with your weight or your appearance, in fact it has absolutely nothing to do with you at all, it's just love overriding every ounce of her common sense or awareness  I know you already know this but it bears repeating bc that's the nature of irrational disordered thinking like ours. It has NOTHING to do with you and she still loves you and wants you to treat yourself nicely, the way she would treat you.
